Text: Today, I voted to require all congressmembers & House employees to complete yearly anti-harassment and anti-discrimination training. We must make Congress a safe, professional environment in which workplace rights and responsibilities are respected.https://twitter.com/latimes/status/935998084487831553 …
The fact is the #GOPTaxScam raises taxes on 82 million middle class families while giving corporations massive tax cuts. We need to put families first, not big business.

#StudentLoan debt is out of control in this country. #GOPTaxScam eliminates the student loan interest deduction & makes it harder to repay for the record number of #Latinos enrolling in universities. The end of the tuition deduction will make college unattainable for Latinos.

In 2015, the #ChildTaxCredit kept nearly 1 million #Latinos out of poverty. The #GOPTaxScam would make hard-working families ineligible for this credit, pushing hundreds of thousands of families into poverty.

#GOPTaxScam pays for tax cuts for the richest by making massive spending cuts to key programs that help our 40th District families make ends meet, stay healthy, put food on the table, and keep a roof over their heads.
